verses.verse: Earnestly Testify <S%G1263><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Before 1799 ADV 3588 T-GSM God 2316 N-GSM And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-GSM Lord 2962 N-GSM Jesus 2424 N-GSM Christ, 5547 N-GSM Who 3588 T-GSM Is About 3195 V-PAP-GSM To Judge 2919 V-PAN Living 2198 V-PAP-APM And 2532 CONJ Dead 3498 A-APM According To 2596 PREP 3588 T-ASF 2015 N-ASF His Appearing 846 P-GSM And 2532 CONJ 3588 T-ASF Kingdom 932 N-ASF His, 846 P-GSM

Proclaim <S%G2784><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word; <S%G3056><s%> Be Urgent <S%G2186><s%> In Season, <S%G2122><s%> Out Of Season, <S%G171><s%> Convict, <S%G1651><s%> Rebuke, <S%G2008><s%> Encourage, <S%G3870><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Patience <S%G3115><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Teaching. <S%G1322><s%>

<S%G2071><s%> For There Will Be <S%G1063><s%> A Time <S%G2540><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sound <S%G5198><s%> Teaching <S%G1319><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Will Not Bear; <S%G430><s%> But <S%G235><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Desires <S%G1939><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Their Own <S%G2398><s%> To Themselves <S%G1438><s%> Will Heap Up <S%G2002><s%> Teachers, <S%G1320><s%> <S%G2833><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Having An Itching Ear; <S%G189><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G575><s%> From <S%G3303><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ear <S%G189><s%> They Will Turn Away, <S%G654><s%> <S%G1909><s%> And To <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fables <S%G3454><s%> Will Be Turned Aside. <S%G1624><s%>

<S%G4771><s%> But Thou, <S%G1161><s%> Be Sober <S%G3525><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All Things, <S%G3956><s%> Suffer Hardships, <S%G2553><s%> The Work <S%G2041><s%> Do <S%G4160><s%> Of An Evangelist, <S%G2099><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1248><s%> Thy Service <S%G4675><s%> Fully Carry Out. <S%G4135><s%>
<S%G1473><s%> For I 1063 CONJ Already 2235 ADV Am Being Poured Out, 4689 V-PPI-1S And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-NSM Time 2540 N-NSM 3588 T-GSF 1699 S-1GSF Of My Release 359 N-GSF Is Come. 2186 V-RAI-3S

The <S%G3588><s%> Combat <S%G73><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> I Have Combated, <S%G75><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Course <S%G1408><s%> I Have Finished, <S%G5055><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> I Have Kept. <S%G5083><s%>

Henceforth <S%G3063><s%> Is Laid Up <S%G606><s%> For Me <S%G3427><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> Crown, <S%G4735><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Will Render <S%G591><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Righteous <S%G1342><s%> Judge; <S%G2923><s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3440><s%> And Not Only <S%G1161><s%> To Me, <S%G1698><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2015><s%> His Appearing. <S%G846><s%>
Be Diligent <S%G4704><s%> To Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Quickly; <S%G5030><s%>

<S%G1214><s%> For Demas <S%G1063><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Forsook, <S%G1459><s%> Having Loved <S%G25><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Present <S%G3568><s%> Age, <S%G165><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Is Gone <S%G4198><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Thessalonica; <S%G2332><s%> Crescens <S%G2913><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Galatia, <S%G1053><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Dalmatia. <S%G1149><s%>

Luke <S%G3065><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Alone <S%G3441><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me. <S%G1700><s%> Mark <S%G3138><s%> Having Taken <S%G353><s%> Bring <S%G71><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Thyself, <S%G4572><s%> <S%G2076><s%> For He Is <S%G1063><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> Useful <S%G2173><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Service. <S%G1248><s%>
Tychicus <S%G5190><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> I Sent <S%G649><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Ephesus. <S%G2181><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Cloak <S%G5341><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I Left <S%G620><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Troas <S%G5174><s%> With <S%G3844><s%> Carpus, <S%G2591><s%> When Coming <S%G2064><s%> Bring, <S%G5342><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Books, <S%G975><s%> Especially <S%G3122><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Parchments <S%G3200><s%>

Alexander <S%G223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Smith <S%G5471><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Against Me <S%G3427><s%> Evil Things <S%G2556><s%> Did. <S%G1731><s%> May Render <S%G591><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> His Works. <S%G846><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Be Ware Of, <S%G5442><s%> <S%G3029><s%> For Exceedingly <S%G1063><s%> He Has Withstood <S%G436><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Our <S%G2251><s%> Words. <S%G3056><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4413><s%> My First <S%G3450><s%> Defence <S%G627><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> , Stood With, <S%G4836><s%> But <S%G235><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Forsook. <S%G1459><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> May It Be Reckoned. <S%G3049><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> Stood By, <S%G3936><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Strengthened <S%G1743><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> ' Through <S%G1223><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Proclamation <S%G2782><s%> Might Be Fully Made, <S%G4135><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Should Hear <S%G191><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations; <S%G1484><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Was Delivered <S%G4506><s%> Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> Lion's <S%G3023><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Will Deliver <S%G4506><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> Wicked, <S%G4190><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Preserve Me <S%G4982><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G932><s%> His Kingdom <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavenly; <S%G2032><s%> To Whom Be <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
Salute <S%G782><s%> Prisca <S%G4251><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Aquila, <S%G207><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of Onesiphorus <S%G3683><s%> House. <S%G3624><s%>

Erastus <S%G2037><s%> Remained <S%G3306><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Corinth, <S%G2882><s%> <S%G5161><s%> But Trophimus <S%G1161><s%> I Left <S%G620><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Miletus <S%G3399><s%> Sick. <S%G770><s%>

Be Diligent <S%G4704><s%> Before <S%G4253><s%> Winter <S%G5494><s%> To Come. <S%G2064><s%> Salutes <S%G782><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Eubulus, <S%G2103><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pudens, <S%G4227><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Linus, <S%G3044><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Claudia, <S%G2803><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> All. <S%G3956><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Be With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4151><s%> Thy Spirit <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Grace Be <S%G5485><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> You. <S%G5216><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> Second, <S%G1208><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Of The Ephesians <S%G2180><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> The First <S%G4413><s%> Overseer <S%G1985><s%> Chosen, <S%G5500><s%> Written <S%G1125><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Rome, <S%G4516><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> <S%G1537><s%> A Second Time <S%G1208><s%> Was Placed Before <S%G3936><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Caesar <S%G2541><s%> Nero. <S%G3505><s%>
